sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"阻止，阻塞"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: block, bar, hinder, obstruct, prevent, hamper
means: block ： 语气强烈，指有效堵住了通道，使人或物无法通过。
bar ： 含义与block很接近，指阻塞通道或禁止出入，但有对暗示不用障碍物的阻止或禁止。
hinder ： 语气较轻，多指阻碍、拖延人或事，强调使进展速度缓慢下来。
obstruct ： 正式用词，语气强，多指以干扰或设置障碍的方式阻碍交通，使不能自由畅通。
prevent ： 含义广泛，指采取预防措施或设置障碍去阻止某人或某事。
hamper ： 侧重因受到约束或阻碍而造成的行动困难。

sentence.Network_en: Does the fact that your players are part-timers help or hinder you?
sentence.Network_cn: 队员们都是兼职的，这对你有利还是不利？

sentence.Network_en: " Go and join the army,'said his wife. " I won't hinder you. "
sentence.Network_cn: “ 去参军吧, ” 他妻子说: “ 我不会阻拦你的. ”

sentence.Network_en: Don't hinder me in my work.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中害字的解释 ... (2) 同本义[ impair;injure;damage;harm] (4) 妨碍,妨害[ hinder] (6) 谋杀,谋害[ kill;murder].
梗字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 草本植物的枝茎〖 stalk〗 阻塞;阻碍〖 obstruct;hinder〗 假借为“抗”。抵御;抗拒〖 resist〗.
格_百度百科 ... 15、 通“茖”。茖葱。山葱[ scallion；onion] 1、 阻止；搁置[ hinder；shelve] 3、 纠正，匡正[ correct].
字典中害字的解释 ... (2) 同本义[ impair;injure;damage;harm] (4) 妨碍,妨害[ hinder] (6) 谋杀,谋害[ kill;murder].

Hindeodus 欣德牙形石属hindered phenol 受阻酚hindered settling 沉降受阻
... ◎ 拖债[ default a debt] ◎ 拖后腿[ hinder (or impede) sb.;be a drag on sb.;hold sb. back] (2) 同本义[ drag;haul;pull].

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hindrian 'injure or damage', of Germanic origin; related to German hindern, also to behind
Middle English: perhaps from Old English hinderweard 'backward', related to behind

entry.def: If something hinders you, it makes it more difficult for you to do something or make progress.

example.ex: Does the fact that your players are part-timers help or hinder you?...
example.tran: 队员们都是兼职的，这对你有利还是不利？

example.ex: Further investigation was hindered by the loss of all documentation on the case.
example.tran: 由于案件卷宗全部丢失致使进一步的调查受阻。

entry.def: If something hinders your movement, it makes it difficult for you to move forward or move around.

example.ex: A thigh injury increasingly hindered her mobility...
example.tran: 大腿受伤使她行动愈发不便。

example.ex: Landslides and bad weather are continuing to hinder the arrival of relief supplies to the area.
example.tran: 滑坡和恶劣天气仍在阻碍救援物资运送到该地区。

means.word_mean: 1. be a hindrance or obstacle to;

sentences.sentence: "She is impeding the progress of our project"

means.word_mean: 2. hinder or prevent the progress or accomplishment of;

sentences.sentence: "His brother blocked him at every turn"
"The brace I have to wear is hindering my movements"

means.word_mean: 1. located at or near the back of an animal;

auth_sentence.content: But he says too much help will hinder productivity.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he says too much help will hinder productivity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he says too much help will hinder productivity.

auth_sentence.content: These pleasures do hinder me in my business.
auth_sentence.res_content: These pleasures do hinder me in my business.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These pleasures do hinder me in my business.

auth_sentence.content: What's to hinder other people from liking one another?
auth_sentence.res_content: What's to hinder other people from liking one another?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What's to hinder other people from liking one another?

stems_affixes.word_buile: hind后部→adj.后边的, 后面的
hindr=hinder妨碍+ance性质,状况→n.障碍,妨碍
hind后部+er反复做→拖后腿→阻止,妨碍

Sentence.sentence: What problem hinders the region's development?
Their answer:"Broad-based welfare-state policies hinder women's representation in elite competitive positions.
Some government policies aided recovery; some hindered it.

sentences.cn: 大雪阻碍了建筑工程的进展。

sentences.en: Nobody wants to hinder your doing that.
sentences.cn: 谁也不想阻止你做那件事。

jushi.english: I'm uncertain whether it will help or hinder.
jushi.chinese: 我不能确定它是否有用。

jushi.english: It is not the dark place that hinders, but the dim eye.
jushi.chinese: 看不清东西,不是因为它在阴暗处,而是因为其视力不好。

jushi.english: I was hindered by the heavy traffic.
